Articles.Content:
Well, I tried out what would happen if I crash into a planet at ridiculously high speeds, and this came out

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I practically flew right threw the planet, but one part got reflected at nearly 10x it's original speed, the rest of the craft got stranded on the rear side of the planet and desintegrated after reloading.
Awww, that would be epic explosion...if only engine could handle it
